name: Dataminr Pulse
description: Dataminr Pulseâ€™s AI-powered real-time intelligence brings faster detection and response into Sumo Logic Cloud Security Analytics. Learn about threats as they unfold to prioritize and manage risk, and protect your physical and digital assets in real time. Dataminr Pulse for Cyber Risk easily fits into your Sumo Logic Cloud Security Analytics workflows, enabling rapid identification and mitigation of emerging threats so you can deliver faster time to detection and response. The global leader in AI for risk detection since 2009, Dataminr Pulse is relied on by two-thirds of Fortune 100 companies to inform their physical, cyber, and converged security operations.

children.name: Dataminr - Alerts Drilldown
children.description: The Dataminr Alerts Drilldown Dashboard gives you convenient tools to analyze threats in more detail, and learn what IOCs are trending. This dashboard is used to filter alerts based on multiple dimensions including individual Dataminr Pulse watchlists, alert source, company name, and more; understand distribution of alert sources based on your filtered selection; analyze the details of specific Dataminr Pulse alerts you want to learn more about and see the latest trending malicious IPs, exploited CVEs, and open ports.
children.title: Dataminr - Alerts Drilldown

panels.title: Most Recent Dataminr Pulse Alerts

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","location.name","_embedded.labels[*].data.vulnerabilities[*].id","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].ip","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].port","expandAlertUrl" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,location,metadata_cyber_vulnerability_ids,metadata_cyber_ip_addresses,metadata_cyber_addresses_port,expand_alert_url nodrop

| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| extract field=company_list "\"?(?<company>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi

// global filters
| where location matches "{{location}}" or isNull(location)
| where severity matches "{{severity}}" or isNull(severity)
| where watchlist_name matches "{{watchlist}}" or isNull(watchlist_name)
| where company matches "{{company}}" or isNull(company)
| where source matches "{{source}}" or isNull(source)
| where topic matches "{{topic}}" or isNull(topic)

| formatDate(toLong(event_time), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as event_time
| if (company_list matches "[]", " ", company_list) as company_list
| category_list as selected_topics
| severity as alert_type
| tourl(source_link,caption) as caption
| count by alert_id,_receiptTime,alert_type,event_time,caption,company_list,channel,source,selected_topics,publisher_category
| formatDate(toLong(_receiptTime),"MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as receipt_time

| top 1000 receipt_time,alert_type,event_time,caption,company_list,source,channel,publisher_category,selected_topics,alert_id by receipt_time
| replace(selected_topics,/^\[|\]$|"/,"") as selected_topics
| replace (company_list,/^\[|\]$|"/,"") as company_list

panels.description: This panel shows the details of recent alerts.

panels.title: Alerts by Source

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "headline"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","odsStatus.link","location.name","_embedded.labels[*].data.vulnerabilities[*].id","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].ip","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].port" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,source_link,location,metadata_cyber_vulnerability_ids,metadata_cyber_ip_addresses,metadata_cyber_addresses_port nodrop

| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| extract field=company_list "\"?(?<company>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi

// global filters
| where location matches "{{location}}" or isNull(location)
| where severity matches "{{severity}}" or isNull(severity)
| where watchlist_name matches "{{watchlist}}" or isNull(watchlist_name)
| where company matches "{{company}}" or isNull(company)
| where source matches "{{source}}" or isNull(source)
| where topic matches "{{topic}}" or isNull(topic)

| where !isNull(source)
| count by alert_id,source
| count as frequency by source
| sort by frequency

panels.description: This panel shows the distribution of alerts by their source.

panels.title: Alerts by Channel

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "channels"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","odsStatus.link","location.name","_embedded.labels[*].data.vulnerabilities[*].id","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].ip","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].port" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,source_link,location,metadata_cyber_vulnerability_ids,metadata_cyber_ip_addresses,metadata_cyber_addresses_port nodrop

| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| extract field=company_list "\"?(?<company>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi

// global filters
| where location matches "{{location}}" or isNull(location)
| where severity matches "{{severity}}" or isNull(severity)
| where watchlist_name matches "{{watchlist}}" or isNull(watchlist_name)
| where company matches "{{company}}" or isNull(company)
| where source matches "{{source}}" or isNull(source)
| where topic matches "{{topic}}" or isNull(topic)

| extract field=channel "\"?(?<channel>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| where !isNull(channel)
| count by alert_id,channel
| count as frequency by channel
| sort by frequency

panels.description: This panel shows the distribution of alerts by their channel.

panels.title: Top 10 Open Ports

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "addresses" "port"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","odsStatus.link","location.name","_embedded.labels[*].data.vulnerabilities[*].id","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].ip","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].port" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,source_link,location,metadata_cyber_vulnerability_ids,metadata_cyber_ip_addresses,metadata_cyber_addresses_port nodrop

| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| extract field=company_list "\"?(?<company>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi

// global filters
| where location matches "{{location}}" or isNull(location)
| where severity matches "{{severity}}" or isNull(severity)
| where watchlist_name matches "{{watchlist}}" or isNull(watchlist_name)
| where company matches "{{company}}" or isNull(company)
| where source matches "{{source}}" or isNull(source)
| where topic matches "{{topic}}" or isNull(topic)

| where !(metadata_cyber_addresses_port="[]")
| extract field=metadata_cyber_addresses_port "\"?(?<port>[\w\s]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| where !(isBlank(port))
| count by alert_id,port
| count as frequency by port
| top 10 port by frequency
| total frequency as total_port_count
| (frequency / total_port_count) * 100 as percent
| round(percent, 6) as percent
| fields -total_port_count

panels.description: This panel shows the top open ports present in alerts.

panels.title: Top 10 Exploiting IP Addresses

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "ip" "addresses"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","odsStatus.link","location.name","_embedded.labels[*].data.vulnerabilities[*].id","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].ip","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].port" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,source_link,location,metadata_cyber_vulnerability_ids,metadata_cyber_ip_addresses,metadata_cyber_addresses_port nodrop

| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| extract field=company_list "\"?(?<company>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi

// global filters
| where location matches "{{location}}" or isNull(location)
| where severity matches "{{severity}}" or isNull(severity)
| where watchlist_name matches "{{watchlist}}" or isNull(watchlist_name)
| where company matches "{{company}}" or isNull(company)
| where source matches "{{source}}" or isNull(source)
| where topic matches "{{topic}}" or isNull(topic)

| where !(metadata_cyber_ip_addresses="[]")
| extract field=metadata_cyber_ip_addresses "\"?(?<ip_address>[\w\s\.:\[\.\]]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| where !(ip_address="[]")

| where !(isBlank(ip_address) or isEmpty(ip_address))
| count by alert_id,ip_address
| count as frequency by ip_address
| top 10 ip_address by frequency
| total frequency as total_ip_count
| (frequency / total_ip_count) * 100 as percent
| round(percent, 6) as percent
| fields - total_ip_count

panels.description: This panel shows the top exploiting IP addresses.

panels.title: Geo Locations of Alerts

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "latitude" "longitude"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","odsStatus.link","location.name","_embedded.labels[*].data.vulnerabilities[*].id","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].ip","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].port" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,source_link,location,metadata_cyber_vulnerability_ids,metadata_cyber_ip_addresses,metadata_cyber_addresses_port nodrop

| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| extract field=company_list "\"?(?<company>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi

// global filters
| where location matches "{{location}}" or isNull(location)
| where severity matches "{{severity}}" or isNull(severity)
| where watchlist_name matches "{{watchlist}}" or isNull(watchlist_name)
| where company matches "{{company}}" or isNull(company)
| where source matches "{{source}}" or isNull(source)
| where topic matches "{{topic}}" or isNull(topic)

| where !(isBlank(latitude) or isBlank(longitude))
| count by alert_id,latitude,longitude
| count as frequency by latitude,longitude

panels.description: This panel shows the geo-locations of all the alerts.

panels.title: Top 10 Trending CVEs

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "vulnerabilities" "id"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","odsStatus.link","location.name","_embedded.labels[*].data.vulnerabilities[*].id","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].ip","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].port" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,source_link,location,metadata_cyber_vulnerability_ids,metadata_cyber_ip_addresses,metadata_cyber_addresses_port nodrop

| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| extract field=company_list "\"?(?<company>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi

// global filters
| where location matches "{{location}}" or isNull(location)
| where severity matches "{{severity}}" or isNull(severity)
| where watchlist_name matches "{{watchlist}}" or isNull(watchlist_name)
| where company matches "{{company}}" or isNull(company)
| where source matches "{{source}}" or isNull(source)
| where topic matches "{{topic}}" or isNull(topic)

| where !(metadata_cyber_vulnerability_ids="[]")
| extract field=metadata_cyber_vulnerability_ids "\"?(?<cve>[\w\s\-]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi

| where !(isBlank(cve))
| count by alert_id,cve
| count as frequency by cve
| top 10 cve by frequency
| total frequency as total_cve_count
| (frequency / total_cve_count) * 100 as percent
| round(percent, 6) as percent
| fields - total_cve_count

panels.description: This panel shows the top trending CVEs present in alerts.

panels.title: Topics Week Trend

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "topics"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","odsStatus.link","location.name","_embedded.labels[*].data.vulnerabilities[*].id","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].ip","_embedded.labels[*].data.addresses[*].port" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,source_link,location,metadata_cyber_vulnerability_ids,metadata_cyber_ip_addresses,metadata_cyber_addresses_port nodrop

| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| extract field=company_list "\"?(?<company>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi

// global filters
| where location matches "{{location}}" or isNull(location)
| where severity matches "{{severity}}" or isNull(severity)
| where watchlist_name matches "{{watchlist}}" or isNull(watchlist_name)
| where company matches "{{company}}" or isNull(company)
| where source matches "{{source}}" or isNull(source)
| where topic matches "{{topic}}" or isNull(topic)

| where !isBlank(topic)
| count by alert_id,topic
| count as this_week_count by topic
| compare timeshift 1w as last_week 
| if (isNull(this_week_count), 0, this_week_count) as this_week_count
| if (isNull(this_week_count_last_week), 0, this_week_count_last_week) as this_week_count_last_week
| this_week_count - this_week_count_last_week as week_trend  
| fields topic, week_trend, this_week_count

panels.description: This panel shows the comparison of a number of alerts within a given time range and the previous week.

sourceDefinition.query:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "name" "location"
| json "location.name" as location 
| count by location
| sort by location asc

$$dataminrpulsesrc  "name" "watchlistsMatchedByType"
| json "watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name" as watchlists_name_list
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| count by watchlists_name_list
| sort by watchlists_name_list asc

$$dataminrpulsesrc  "topics" "name"
| json "topics[*].name" as company_list
| extract field=company_list "\"?(?<company>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| count by company
| sort by company asc

$$dataminrpulsesrc  "alertType" "name"
| json "alertType.name" as severity
| count by severity
| sort by severity asc

$$dataminrpulsesrc  "headlineData" "via"
| json "headlineData.via" as source
| count by source
| sort by source asc

$$dataminrpulsesrc  "categories" "name"
| json "categories[*].name" as categorylist 
| extract field=categorylist "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| count by topic
| sort by topic asc

children.name: Dataminr - Alerts Overview
children.description: The Dataminr Alerts Dashboard gives you an at-a-glance view of recent alerts and alerting trends based on the Dataminr watchlists you have configured in the Dataminr platform (app.dataminr.com). This dashboard is used to see the breakdown of Dataminr Pulse alerts based on severity and companies affected, View trends of Dataminr Pulse alerts by topic and subtopic, understand the location distribution of Dataminr Pulse physical and cyber alerts by geography, with the ability to zoom in for more detailed views and analyze the details of the latest Dataminr Pulse alerts.
children.title: Dataminr - Alerts Overview

panels.title: Alerts by Company

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "topics"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","publisherCategory.name" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,publisher_category nodrop
// topics array of name (topics[*].name) is the list of companies of alerts.
// categories array of name (categories[*].name) is the list of topics of alerts.
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=channel "\"?(?<channel>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| where !isNull(channel)
| where !isNull(source)

// global filters
| where watchlist_name matches "{{watchlist}}"

| extract field=company_list "\"?(?<company>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| where !isBlank(company)
| count by alert_id,company
| count as frequency by company
| sort by frequency

panels.description: This panel shows the distribution of cyber alerts by their company.

panels.title: Recent 10 Alerts

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","publisherCategory.name","expandAlertUrl" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,publisher_category,source_link nodrop
// topics array of name (topics[*].name) is the list of companies of alerts.
// categories array of name (categories[*].name) is the list of topics of alerts.
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=channel "\"?(?<channel>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]"
| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| where !isNull(channel)
| where !isNull(source)

// global filters
| where watchlist_name matches "{{watchlist}}"

| formatDate(toLong(event_time), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as event_time
| if (company_list matches "[]", " ", company_list) as company_list
| category_list as selected_topics
| severity as alert_type
| tourl(source_link,caption) as caption
| count by alert_id,_receiptTime,alert_type,event_time,caption,company_list,channel,source,selected_topics,publisher_category
| formatDate(toLong(_receiptTime),"MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as receipt_time

| top 10 receipt_time,alert_type,event_time,caption,company_list,source,channel,publisher_category,selected_topics,alert_id by receipt_time
| replace(selected_topics,/^\[|\]$|"/,"") as selected_topics
| replace (company_list,/^\[|\]$|"/,"") as company_list

panels.description: This panel shows the summary of the last 10 cyber alerts.

panels.title: Locations of Cyber Alerts

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "latitude" "longitude"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","publisherCategory.name" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,publisher_category nodrop
// topics array of name (topics[*].name) is the list of companies of alerts.
// categories array of name (categories[*].name) is the list of topics of alerts.
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=channel "\"?(?<channel>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| where !isNull(channel)
| where !isNull(source)

// global filters
| where watchlist_name matches "{{watchlist}}"

| where !(isBlank(latitude) or isBlank(longitude))
| count by alert_id,latitude,longitude
| count as frequency by latitude,longitude

panels.description: This panel shows the geo-locations of cyber alerts.

panels.title: Alerts Topic Trend

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "topics"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","publisherCategory.name" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,publisher_category nodrop
// topics array of name (topics[*].name) is the list of companies of alerts.
// categories array of name (categories[*].name) is the list of topics of alerts.
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=channel "\"?(?<channel>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| where !isNull(channel)
| where !isNull(source)

// global filters
| where watchlist_name matches "{{watchlist}}"

| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| timeslice 1d
| fillmissing timeslice,values all in topic
| count by alert_id, _timeslice,topic
| count by _timeslice,topic
| transpose row _timeslice column topic

panels.description: This panel shows the trend of selected topics in cyber alerts.

panels.title: Alerts by Severity

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "alertType" "name"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via","publisherCategory.name" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,publisher_category nodrop
// topics array of name (topics[*].name) is the list of companies of alerts.
// categories array of name (categories[*].name) is the list of topics of alerts.
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=channel "\"?(?<channel>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| where !isNull(channel)
| where !isNull(source)

// global filters
| 0 as priority 
| count by alert_id,severity,priority
| count as frequency by severity,priority
| if(severity="Flash",4,if(severity="Urgent",3,if(severity="Urgent Update",2,if(severity="Alert",1,0)))) as priority
| sort by priority
| fields - priority

panels.description: This panel shows the distribution of cyber alerts by their severity.

sourceDefinition.query:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "watchlistsMatchedByType"
| json "watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name" as watchlists_name_list
| extract field=watchlists_name_list "\"?(?<watchlist_name>[\w\s\,&*.</>!]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| count by watchlist_name
| sort by watchlist_name asc

children.name: Dataminr - Cyber Threat Landscape
children.description: The Cyber Threat Landscape Dashboard provides a breakdown of Dataminr Pulse cyber threat alerts into topics and subtopics. This dashboard is used to see the overall number of alerts and daily trends for threat actors, cyber attacks, data breaches, and vulnerability topic areas, understand the breakdown of each major topic by subtopics, such as Threat Actor subtopics of Hacktivists, Ransomware Gangs, and Advanced Persistent Threats (APTs) and view all of the alerts by major topic, and easily see details of those alerts in the Dataminr Pulse platform.
children.title: Dataminr - Cyber Threat Landscape

panels.title: Threat Actor Activities

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "topics" "uiListType"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source nodrop
// topics array of name (topics[*].name) is the list of companies of alerts.
// categories array of name (categories[*].name) is the list of topics of alerts.

| where watchlist_cyber_alerts matches "*CYBER*"
| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| where topic in ("Advanced Persistent Threats","Ransomware","Hacktivists")
| timeslice 1d
| count by alert_id,_timeslice
| count by _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice

panels.description: This panel shows the count of alerts related to the threat actor activities.

panels.title: Cyber Attacks

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "uiListType" "topics"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source nodrop
// topics array of name (topics[*].name) is the list of companies of alerts.
// categories array of name (categories[*].name) is the list of topics of alerts.

| where watchlist_cyber_alerts matches "*CYBER*"
| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| where topic in ("Malware","Network Disruptions","Phishing","DDoS","Defacement","Domain Impersonation","Network Scans")
| timeslice 1d
| count by alert_id,_timeslice
| count by _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice

| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via" as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source nodrop

panels.description: This panel shows the count of alerts related to each vulnerabilities topics.

panels.title: Recent Threat Actor Activities

queries.queryString:
$$dataminrpulsesrc  "uiListType" "topics"
| json "index","odsStatus.source.channels","location.latitude","location.longitude","topics[*].name","categories[*].name","alertType.name","headline","timestamp","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].name","watchlistsMatchedByType[*].userProperties.uiListType","headlineData.via" ,"expandAlertUrl"as alert_id,channel,latitude,longitude,company_list,category_list,severity,caption,event_time,watchlists_name_list,watchlist_cyber_alerts,headline_source,source_link nodrop
// topics array of name (topics[*].name) is the list of companies of alerts.
// categories array of name (categories[*].name) is the list of topics of alerts.

| where watchlist_cyber_alerts matches "*CYBER*"
| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=company_list "\"?(?<company>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=channel "\"?(?<channel>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]"
| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| where !isNull(channel)
| where !isNull(source)

| where topic in ("Advanced Persistent Threats","Ransomware","Hacktivists")

| tourl(source_link,caption) as caption
| count by _receiptTime, caption, topic, severity, source, company,alert_id
| formatDate(toLong(_receiptTime),"MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as receipt_time
| top 100 receipt_time,caption, topic, severity, source, company,alert_id by receipt_time

panels.description: This panel shows details of cyber alerts with it's related threat actor activity.

| where watchlist_cyber_alerts matches "*CYBER*"
| extract field=category_list "\"?(?<topic>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=company_list "\"?(?<company>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]" multi
| extract field=channel "\"?(?<channel>[\w\s\-&.,]*)\"?[,\n\]]"
| extract field=caption "via (?<source>.*)\.$" multi
| where !isNull(channel)
| where !isNull(source)

| where topic in ("Malware","Network Disruptions","Phishing","DDoS","Defacement","Domain Impersonation","Network Scans")

| tourl(source_link,caption) as caption
| count by _receiptTime, caption, topic, severity, source, company,alert_id
| formatDate(toLong(_receiptTime),"MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as receipt_time
| top 100 receipt_time,caption, topic, severity, source, company,alert_id by receipt_time
